title: I Draw a Bunny
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: In I Draw a Bunny, students will read about the steps a girl uses to draw a bunny. Early emergent readers are supported by high-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed photographs. Students will have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as they read this interesting how-to book.
meta: body, bunny, draw, ears, tail, teeth
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
Concept Words : Recognize and write number words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
